wikipedia_page.main: Karenza Mathews (née Smith) is a female former international table tennis player from England.

link_mentions.page: List of England players at the World Team Table Tennis Championships
response: | Ron Crayden (npc), Karenza Mathews, Judy Williams, Jill Shirley, Mary Shannon-Wright
|Karenza Mathews, Linda Howard, Jill Hammersley, Carole Knight
She represented England at the 1969 World Table Tennis Championships in the Corbillon Cup (women's team event) with Karenza Mathews, Jill Shirley and Mary Shannon-Wright.
She represented England at the 1971 World Table Tennis Championships in the Corbillon Cup (women's team event) with Karenza Mathews and Jill Shirley.
